textBeforeTable: Check out some of the deals below or visit www.grabaseat.co.nz to see more and start grabbing! Simply book before 23:59 on Wednesday 19th June 2013 for some great New Zealand domestic flight deals! It's that time of year when the chill in the air announces the start to the ski season and boy are we spoilt for choice here in New Zealand. There are half a dozen different ski fields within two hours of both Queenstown and Christchurch airports. Some of them with their own little townships nearby with amazing views of the Southern Alps.
